programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Meteor Shower / Paddington and the Talent Show) S1 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Meteor Shower / Paddington and the Talent Show»Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge) S1 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge»Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bibliothèque) S3 (4/52)
programme.desc: «La bibliothèque»Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping-car) S3 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping-car»Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vacances en camping-car) S3 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vacances en camping-car»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le compost) S3 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Le compost»Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La Géode) S5 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La Géode»Goby and Gil go on a quest to get a geode at the top of a volcano! Will they make it back to the Rocky Valley Rock Show in time to enter the contest for best rock?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'expérience de Blue) S1 (14/17)
programme.desc: «L'expérience de Blue»Josh and Blue dive into science and do all kinds of fun experiments to learn more about how the world works. But which experiment does Blue really want to do? Josh plays Blue's Clues to find out.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une histoire pour Blue) S1 (12/17)
programme.desc: «Une histoire pour Blue»We are almost ready to read but first we need to play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite story! While looking for clues, we help Shovel & Pail act out "Jack & Jill" and match the three bears with their belongings.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon»Animated children's series following the adventures of a young pirate, Captain Santiago, and his mishmash of crewmates as they sail the high seas on spectacular quests.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La malédiction du faucon doré) S1 (14/21)
programme.desc: «La malédiction du faucon doré»Capitán Santiago, his pet frog Kiko, cousin Tomás and mermaid friend Lorelai are the Pirate Protectors of Isla Encanto! And with his magic pirate ship El Bravo and enchanted tools, Santiago will lead his brave crew on quests across the high seas.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le défi du requin) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le défi du requin»Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Welcome Wagon) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Welcome Wagon»Welcome Wagon: When Baby's new neighbour doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind. (S1, ep 25b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la chasse au trésor) S2 (20/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la chasse au trésor»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de George) S2 (26/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de George»C'est l'anniversaire de George. Maman et Papa Cochon lui offrent un jouet brontosaure. Puis ils se rendent au musée afin de voir d'autres spécimens de dinosaures...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les petites bêtes) S2 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Les petites bêtes»All kind of animals can be seen in Grandpa Pig's garden. At first Peppa is startled by a snail, but when she looks at it carefully, she wants to imitate it. And when Peppa's friends come too, the garden is full of little critters!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de sport) S2 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de sport»Peppa and George are allowed to go to Daddy Pig's office for a day. They like all the work done in the office equally.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (25/78)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (26/78)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les nouvelles lunettes de Magenta) S1 (9/17)
programme.desc: «Les nouvelles lunettes de Magenta»It's an exciting day for Magenta because she's getting glasses! We play a special game of Blue and Magenta's Clues to find out what Magenta wants to do when she gets her glasses and we get to go with her to meet.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une balade en raquettes / L'étang aux canards) S5 (12/26)
programme.desc: «Une balade en raquettes / L'étang aux canards»When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Circus Pup-Formers) S1 (17/26)
programme.desc: «Circus Pup-Formers»When the animals don't show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots) S1 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots»A meteor hits Earth and Mister Steel's heroic demeanor forces Deer Squad to save everyone. A dance competition in Middenbos turns into a mess.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !) S2 (3/20)
programme.desc: «Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !»When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective) S1 (13/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective»It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pizza) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pizza»

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Filouland / Les chevaliers de la mer profonde) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Filouland / Les chevaliers de la mer profonde»Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La bestiole baveuse) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La bestiole baveuse»A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Party Time) S1 (22/78)
programme.desc: «Party Time»Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (27/78)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Key) S1 (n°69)
programme.desc: «The Key»The Key: Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. (S1, ep 69).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Everywhere at Once) S1 (n°72)
programme.desc: «Everywhere at Once»Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le garage de Papy Dog) S2 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Le garage de Papy Dog»It is amazing what Grandpa Dog provides everyone within his garage. And fortunately, otherwise you have bad luck with your bad luck as a breakdown! But when something goes wrong with the new car wash, Papa Pig suddenly turns out to be the great savior.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en montgolfière) S2 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en montgolfière»Peppa et sa famille sont à la fête de l'école. Le gros lot de la tombola est un voyage en Montgolfière. Peppa gagne : toute la famille apprécie le vol jusqu'à ce que le ballon s'accroche à un arbre...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Georges attrape un rhume) S2 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Georges attrape un rhume»Peppa et George adorent sauter dans les flaques de boue, même quand il pleut. Mais quand George enlève son chapeau, il prend froid. Après beaucoup de repos, de lait chaud et de miel, George se sent beaucoup mieux. Maintenant il est très heureux de porter son chapeau, même quand il ne pleut pas...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'examen de la vue) S2 (16/52)
programme.desc: «L'examen de la vue»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardin de Peppa et George) S4 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardin de Peppa et George»Granpa Pig comes for a visit and brings Peppa and George seeds for a flower garden. They plant them, but birds want to eat them. Daddy Pig must help out with scaring the birds away. Soon beautiful flowers grow out in the garden, and one of them is taller than the house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vétérinaire volante) S4 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La vétérinaire volante»The Flying Vet: Doctor Hamster is having a busy day - there are lots of helpless animals that need her help!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Kylie Kangeroo) S5 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Kylie Kangeroo»Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Zero Waste) S1 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Zero Waste»When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mail Truck Blaze) S7 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Mail Truck Blaze»When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sparkle à la rescousse) S7 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Sparkle à la rescousse»When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La biblio-mobile / Monsieur Hellinger voit les choses en grand) S5 (8/26)
programme.desc: «La biblio-mobile / Monsieur Hellinger voit les choses en grand»When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Au pays des papayes / La récolte de maïs) S5 (10/26)
programme.desc: «Au pays des papayes / La récolte de maïs»Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with the Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué) S2 (4/20)
programme.desc: «Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué»Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Steelzilla) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Steelzilla»Steelzilla: Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to enormous size and trashes the city! (S1, ep 1b).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Meteor Shower / Paddington and the Talent Show) S1 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Meteor Shower / Paddington and the Talent Show»Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge) S1 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge»Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bibliothèque) S3 (4/52)
programme.desc: «La bibliothèque»Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping-car) S3 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping-car»Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vacances en camping-car) S3 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vacances en camping-car»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le compost) S3 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Le compost»Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La Géode) S5 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La Géode»Goby and Gil go on a quest to get a geode at the top of a volcano! Will they make it back to the Rocky Valley Rock Show in time to enter the contest for best rock?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'expérience de Blue) S1 (14/17)
programme.desc: «L'expérience de Blue»Josh and Blue dive into science and do all kinds of fun experiments to learn more about how the world works. But which experiment does Blue really want to do? Josh plays Blue's Clues to find out.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une histoire pour Blue) S1 (12/17)
programme.desc: «Une histoire pour Blue»We are almost ready to read but first we need to play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite story! While looking for clues, we help Shovel & Pail act out "Jack & Jill" and match the three bears with their belongings.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon»Animated children's series following the adventures of a young pirate, Captain Santiago, and his mishmash of crewmates as they sail the high seas on spectacular quests.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La malédiction du faucon doré) S1 (14/21)
programme.desc: «La malédiction du faucon doré»Capitán Santiago, his pet frog Kiko, cousin Tomás and mermaid friend Lorelai are the Pirate Protectors of Isla Encanto! And with his magic pirate ship El Bravo and enchanted tools, Santiago will lead his brave crew on quests across the high seas.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le défi du requin) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le défi du requin»Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Welcome Wagon) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Welcome Wagon»Welcome Wagon: When Baby's new neighbour doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind. (S1, ep 25b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la chasse au trésor) S2 (20/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la chasse au trésor»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une promenade à vélo) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Une promenade à vélo»Peppa et sa famille vont faire un tour en vélo. Peppa aime faire du vélo en descente mais elle n'aime pas trop remonter. Ainsi, quand ils rencontrent les amis de Peppa et décident de faire une course, Peppa insiste pour qu'elle soit en descente...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le patin à glace) S2 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le patin à glace»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig en anglais (Dentist) S2 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Dentist»

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (29/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (30/78)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'équipe pleine d'idées) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «L'équipe pleine d'idées»Clues house! While playing "superheroes" we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal»After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup) S2 (5/20)
programme.desc: «La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup»Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets) S1 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets»Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le champion de minigolf / Sans Pierrot) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Le champion de minigolf / Sans Pierrot»A selfish fish takes over the putt-putt in 'Daddy Shack', then in 'Rocky-Bye', Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky. (S1, ep 12).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William vs. Wild) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «William vs. Wild»After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (28/78)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (33/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»The Blue Butterfly: Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. (S1, ep 73).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Atchoum !) S1 (74/78)
programme.desc: «Atchoum !»Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Giant Strawberry) S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: «The Giant Strawberry»When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La maison de Rebecca Rabbit) S2 (39/52)
programme.desc: «La maison de Rebecca Rabbit»Peppa and her entire class go on a school trip to the mountains. There they discover the ultrasound, exchange their lunch and have a wonderful day. And before they get back they also sing the Bing-Bong song!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Alexandre le petit cousin) S2 (31/52)
programme.desc: «Alexandre le petit cousin»La cousine de Peppa et George vient d'avoir un petit frère. Alexandre est trop petit pour jouer. Peppa et George trouvent une idée pour s'amuser avec lui.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le sentier de randonnée) S2 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le sentier de randonnée»Suzie Sheep comes to play at Peppa's, together with her invisible friend Leo de Leeuw. Peppa has to get used to it, but soon she is playing Suzie's game, just like Papa and Mama Pig. Only George finds it difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami imaginaire) S2 (37/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami imaginaire»Suzy, le mouton, joue avec Peppa. Elle s'est inventé un ami imaginaire appelé Léo le lion. Peppa ne peut pas voir Léo ; Suzy lui révèle qu'il aime se déguiser...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Dog) S4 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Dog»Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit) S4 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit»Peppa and her friends are celebrating Freddy Fox's birthday at Grampy Rabbit's dinosaur themed park. Grampy takes them on a wild adventure and shows them some singing dinosaurs. The gang then follows dinosaur footprints to find a special surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une histoire pour George) S4 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Une histoire pour George»Bedtime Story: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story to help them fall asleep. When George wakes up again Peppa has to make up a bedtime story to get him back to sleep.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia»1.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (The Super Skateboard) S7 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Super Skateboard»It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mail Truck Blaze) S7 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Mail Truck Blaze»When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sauvons les tortues / Le drône de Danny) S5 (15/26)
programme.desc: «Sauvons les tortues / Le drône de Danny»Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie) S5 (21/26)
programme.desc: «La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie»Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La danse de l'espace / Le croqueur de diamant) S2 (n°206)
programme.desc: «La danse de l'espace / Le croqueur de diamant»Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song in 'Satellite Flight', then in 'Diamond Geezer', Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond! (S2, ep 6).
